title: Scrollbars are enabled in ImageAnalyzer example when they should be disabled
description: The scrollbars in the ImageAnalyzer example are enabled and can be moved, but they do not have any effect. This is misleading, especially when opening a small image such as an icon.
OB: When using build F2 (20020602) on Redhat 7.2 with GTK2 KDE 2.210 (GTK2 only), open the ImageAnalyzer example. Notice that the scrollbars are enabled and can be moved, but they do not have any effect. This can be observed when opening a small image, like an icon.
SR:
1. Launch build F2 (20020602) on Redhat 7.2 with GTK2 KDE 2.210 (GTK2 only).
2. Open the ImageAnalyzer example.
3. Observe the enabled scrollbars that can be moved, but do not have any effect.
4. Open a small image, like an icon, and again observe that the scrollbars are present but do not do anything.
